attributes.action: help give Lee Evans an MBE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We believe that Lee Evans deserves an MBE for all his services to comedy. 

This great man needs to be rewarded for the tears of laughter that many of us have wept through the years. 

He is a family man from Bristol that that has worked his way up to be one of the UK's most loved Comedians. He is also a great Actor, with credits like Mouse Hunt, The Fifth Element and There's Something About Mary  he has made a name for him self in the USA.  He has even broke the Guinness World Record for a solo act performing to the biggest comedy audience In November 2005, playing to 10,108 at the Manchester Evening News Arena. 

This man is a true Briton that deserves this honor and we ask for you backing.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
